data.name: Video_EncoderExtraArgs
data.value: The full list of encoder parameters: {0}

data.name: Video_x264FastDecode
data.value:
Reduce decoder CPU usage.
Set this if your device is struggling to play the output. (i.e. dropped frames)

data.name: Video_LosslessWarningTooltip
data.value:
A value of 0 means lossless and will result in a file size that is larger than the original source, unless the source was also lossless.
x264 and x265's scale is logarithmic and lower values correspond to higher quality.
So small increases in value will result in progressively larger increases in the resulting file size.

data.name: AddPreset_PictureSizeMode
data.value:
You can optionally store a picture settings with this preset. There are 3 modes:
None: Picture settings are not stored in the preset. When loading a source, they will remain as-is within the bounds of the source resolution. This also affects Anamorphic, modulus, cropping etc.
Custom: You can optionally set a Maximum width and Height. When doing this an encode will be less than or equal to these values. Keep Aspect Ratio will be automatically turned on.
Source Maximum: Always encode at the sources resolution where possible.

data.name: About_GPL
data.value:
This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.
This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details.
You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along with this program; if not, write to the Free Software Foundation, Inc., 51 Franklin Street, Fifth Floor, Boston, MA 02110-1301, USA.

data.name: Main_PresetUpdateNotification

The preset you are trying to import is from a different version of HandBrake. It may not be possible to import all the values from this preset.
Do you wish to proceed?

data.name: Preset_UnableToImport_Message
data.value: Unable to import the preset as it appears to be corrupted or from an older version of HandBrake.

data.name: Main_SetDestination
data.value: You must first set the destination path for the output file before adding to the queue.

data.name: Main_InvalidDestination
data.value: The entered destination path contained illegal characters and will not be updated.

data.name: Main_MatchingFileOverwriteWarning
data.value: You cannot encode to a file with the same path and filename as the source file. Please update the destination filename so that it does not match the source file.

data.name: Main_UnableToLoadHelpMessage
data.value: Your system prevented HandBrake from launching a web browser.

data.name: Main_UnableToLoadHelpSolution
data.value: You can still access the help pages by visiting the website directly at: https://handbrake.fr

data.name: Main_PresetImportFailed
data.value: Unable to import the selected preset.

data.name: Main_PresetImportFailedSolution
data.value: The preset may be corrupted or from an older version of HandBrake which is not supported. Presets from older versions must be re-created in the current version.

data.name: Video_EncoderExtraArgsTooltip
data.value: Additional advanced arguments that can be passed to the video encoder.

data.name: Subtitles_BurnInBehaviourModes
data.value: None - Only tracks where the container does not support the format will be burned in. Foreign Audio Track - The Foreign Audio track will be burned in if available. First Track - The first track will be burned in. Foreign Audio Preferred, else First - If the foreign audio track exists, it will be burned in, otherwise the first track will be chosen.

data.name: Subtitles_WebmSubtitleIncompatibilityError
data.value:
WebM in HandBrake only supports burned subtitles.
You should change your subtitle selections.
If you continue, your non-burned subtitles will be lost.

data.name: Main_ScanNoTitlesFound
data.value: No valid source or titles found.

data.name: Main_ScanNoTitlesFoundMessage
data.value:
HandBrake will not be able to encode the selected source as it did not find a valid source with titles to encode. This could be due to one of the following reasons:
- The duration of each source title is below the "Minimum Title Duration" threshold option in 'Preferences > Advanced'. - The source file is not a valid video file or is in a format that HandBrake does not support. - The source may be copy protected or include DRM. Please note that HandBrake does not support the removal of copy protections.
The Activity log may have further information.
